title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 363.5 - Concurrent employment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 363.5 - Concurrent employment

State Regulations

An employee is in concurrent employment when he is
regularly and customarily in the employ of more than one covered employer
within the same calendar week under circumstances which make him concurrently
eligible for benefits in such employments as provided in subdivision 2 of
section
204
of the Workers' Compensation Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
363.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
